name: Breakout with a Twist!
description:
Hello There!

I am Pasindu from Sri Lanka. This game is about a lil cube / square called kit who partners up with the paddle in Atari Breakout and try's to defeat the block invaders

Power through 3 levels destroying the corruption and saving the Pet-A-Verse!

Please play this game on  "FULL SCREEN MODE"

Thank u

Knight 2755

PM
